name: amidst inconsequence
description: i'm treating hicetnunc as a drawing board of ideas . this allows me to be far less precious about the work i make public, as it doesn't need to fit a linear aesthetic . one of my studio experiments has been combining text with imagery, often in abstraction . i've sought to produce work that offers multiple interpretations without forcing any one single perspective, though without exception i am always making commentary . anything else is up to you | amidst inconsequence (2021) | Brendan Conrad Forde | @acid_very
